title: What's New in Ultra Code Fence
subtitle: February 2026
description: A super-charged code fence replacement for Obsidian that allows for external code, line numbers, execution output, code folding and so much more

new.text: Choose from Tab, Integrated, Minimal, Info Bar, or hide completely
Click to open source file in Obsidian or browser
Optional line number gutter with correct numbering for partial extracts
Alternate line highlighting for easier reading
Extract code between comment markers instead of line numbers
Use your own icon images from a vault folder
Choose Emoji, Text labels, Custom images, or None
Automatically adapts to light/dark Obsidian themes
Override any default setting using YAML properties
Clean, organized settings with tabs and sections
